item.title: WW - Hello World
item.description: hello world I would say that nearly every programmer in the world has written a so-called “hello world” program at some point in their journey. This program, once launched, prints “hello world” to the screen and then exits. A very simple goal, but the countless ways to write such a program is a testament to the myriad of techniques and languages programmers use. Diving a little deeper though, we see that underneath such a simple program, an immense amount of work is being done.
